AccountInfo.description: The account info stored per account on the blockchain

nonce.description: The nonce of the account. Added to each transaction before signed to prevent replays and enforce ordering

CommodityTypes.description: This is commodities served by different services in Fleek Network. C-like enums used here to future proof for state, if we add more commodity types

HandshakePorts.description: The ports a node has open for the handshake server

consensus_key.description: The BLS public key of the node which is used for our BFT DAG consensus multi signatures.

nonce.description: The nonce of the node. Added to each transaction before signed to prevent replays and enforce ordering

participation.description: The participation status of the node

public_key.description: Public key that is used for fast communication signatures for this node.

stake.description: The amount of stake by the node.

staked_since.description: The epoch that this node has been staked since,

worker_public_key.description: The public key of the nodes narwhal worker

NodePorts.description: The ports a node has open for its processes

Participation.description: Indicates the participation status of a node.

ProofOfConsensus.description: Placeholder This is the proof used to operate our PoC bridges

ProofOfMisbehavior.description: Placeholder This is the proof presented to the slashing function that proves a node misbehaved and should be slashed

ProtocolParams.description: Adjustable parameters that are stored in the blockchain

oneOf.description: The time in milliseconds that an epoch lasts for. Genesis 24 hours(86400)
The size of the committee
The min FLK a node has to stake to participate in the network
The time in epochs a node has to be staked to participate in the network
The time in epochs a node has to wait to withdraw after unstaking
The percentage of the reward pool the protocol gets
The percentage of the reward pool goes to edge nodes
The percentage of the reward pool goes to edge nodes
The maximum target inflation rate in a year
The max multiplier on rewards for locking
The max amount of time tokens can be locked

ReputationMeasurements.description: Contains the peer measurements that node A has about node B, that will be taken into account when computing B's reputation score.

commodity_type.description: the commodity that service is going to serve

owner.description: the owner address that deploys the service and also recieves reward share

slashing.description: TODO: List of circuits to prove a node should be slashed

Staking.description: Struct that stores the information about the stake of amount of a node.

locked.description: How much FLK is locked pending withdraw

locked_until.description: The epoch the locked FLK is eligible to be withdrawn

stake_locked_until.description: The epoch until all stakes are locked for boosting rewards

staked.description: How much FLK that is currently staked

UpdateMethod.description: All of the update functions in our logic, along their parameters.

oneOf.description: The main function of the application layer. After aggregating ProofOfAcknowledgements a node will submit this transaction to get paid. Revisit the naming of this transaction.

commodity.description: How much of the commodity was served

metadata.description: Optional metadata to provide information additional information about this batch

proofs.description: The PoD of delivery in bytes

service_id.description: The service id of the service this was provided through(CDN, compute, ect.)

oneOf.description: Withdraw tokens from the network back to the L2

receiving_address.description: The address to recieve these tokens on the L2

oneOf.description: Submit of PoC from the bridge on the L2 to get the tokens in network

proof.description: The proof of the bridge recieved from the L2,

oneOf.description: Transfer tokens to another address
Stake FLK in network
Lock the current stakes to get boosted inflation rewards this is different than unstake and withdrawl lock
Unstake FLK, the tokens will be locked for a set amount of time(ProtocolParameter::LockTime) before they can be withdrawn
Withdraw tokens from a node after lock period has passed must be submitted by node owner but optionally they can provide a different public key to receive the tokens
Sent by committee member to signal he is ready to change epoch
Adding a new service to the protocol
Removing a service from the protocol

service_id.description: Service Id of the service to be removed

oneOf.description: Provide proof of misbehavior to slash a node

node.description: The public key of the node that misbehaved

proof_of_misbehavior.description: Zk proof to be provided to the slash circuit

service_id.description: Service id of the service a node misbehaved in

oneOf.description: Report reputation measurements
Change protocol parameters
Opt out of participating in the network.
Opt into participating in the network.

UpdatePayload.description: The payload data of FN transaction

method.description: The transition function (and parameters) for this update request.

nonce.description: The counter or nonce of this request.

UpdateRequest.description: An update transaction, sent from users to the consensus to migrate the application from one state to the next state.

payload.description: The payload of an update request, which contains a counter (nonce), and the transition function itself.

signature.description: The signature by the user signing this payload.
